Description: The Gretsch Professional Collection G6131-FSR Firebird is an exceptionally beautiful bird indeed, with a gorgeous two-tone finish consisting of a bound Firebird Red top on a Walnut Stain chambered mahogany “pre-FMI''-spec Jet body with a single cutaway, a five-ply arched maple top and 1.75'' body depth. Pure and powerful Gretsch tone comes from two High Sensitive Filter’Tron pickups. Other premium features include a maple neck with “U'' profile and bound headstock, 22-fret bound rosewood fingerboard with 12'' radius and pearloid “Hump-Block'' inlays, three-way toggle pickup switch and four “G Arrow'' control knobs (volume for each pickup, master tone, master volume), gold plexi pickguard with Gretsch logo, Adjusto-Matic bridge with pinned ebony base, “G''-cutout tailpiece, Grover Rotomatic tuners, bone nut and gold-plated hardware. Deluxe hard-shell case included.Body Shape: Single Cut-Away Jet (Pre-FMI) Finish: Polyurethane Neck: Maple, "U" ShapeFrets: 22 Fingerboard: Rosewood, 12" (305mm) Radius Nut Width: 1.6875" (43 mm) Scale Length: 24.6" (625 mm) Pickups: High Sensitive Filter'Tron Pickup Switching: 3-Position Toggle: Position 1. Bridge Pickup, Position 2. Bridge and Neck Pickups, Position 3. Neck Pickup Controls: Volume 1. (Neck Pickup), Volume 2. (Bridge Pickup), Master Tone, Master Volume Bridge: "Pinned" Ebony-Based Adjusto-Matic Hardware: Gold-Plated Tuning Keys: Grover Rotomatic 102-18GOther Features: Pearloid "Hump-Block" Position Inlays, Arched 5-Ply Maple Top and Mahogany Back, G-Arrow Control Knobs, Included Deluxe Hardshell Case, Gold Plexi Pickguard with Gretsch Logo.
Title: Gorgeous Gretsch G6131-FSR Firebird Red
ConditionDescription: Guitar is in excellent condition. Case is in good condition.
